comments.body: It feels like this should be a flag and should be part of TASTy.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +264,268 @@      // TODO should be add `@experimental` to `class experimental` in PostTyper?
      self.eq(defn.ExperimentalAnnot)
      || self.hasAnnotation(defn.ExperimentalAnnot)
      || (self.maybeOwner.isClass && self.owner.hasAnnotation(defn.ExperimentalAnnot))
